articles.author: Ariane de Vogue, CNN Supreme Court Reporter
articles.title: Breyer makes it official: He's leaving the Supreme Court on Thursday at noon
articles.description: Justice Stephen Breyer has notified the White House that his retirement will be effective Thursday, June 30, at noon ET.

articles.author: Marshall Cohen, Zachary Cohen and Alex Rogers, CNN
articles.title: 7 takeaways from Tuesday's shocking January 6 hearing
articles.description: The House select committee investigating the January 6, 2021, Capitol Hill insurrection reconvened Tuesday for a hastily scheduled hearing, featuring blockbuster testimony from Trump White House aide Cassidy Hutchinson.

articles.author: By Helen Regan, Jack Guy, Hafsa Khalil, Aditi Sangal, Laura Smith-Spark and Adrienne Vogt, CNN
articles.title: Live updates: Russia's war in Ukraine
articles.description: NATO leaders will decide Wednesday whether to invite Finland and Sweden to join the security alliance after Turkey agreed to support their membership bid. It comes after Turkey, Finland and Sweden signed a joint memorandum. Follow live updates.

articles.title: Video: GOP senator avoids CNN questioning about January 6 developments - CNN Video
articles.description: Sen. Ron Johnson (R-WI) avoided CNN and other reporters in Milwaukee, refusing to answer questions about the dramatic developments in the January 6 hearings and his handling of the fake electors issue.

articles.author: Analysis by Stephen Collinson, CNN
articles.title: Analysis: Another American woman just stood up to protect democracy from Trump
articles.description: A quintet of courageous American women are defending American democracy in its darkest hour, and effectively delivering a warning about the rage and tyranny that may await if Donald Trump gets back into the White House after 2024.

articles.author: Katelyn Polantz, CNN Reporter, Crime and Justice
articles.title: John Eastman drops challenge to House subpoena for his call log data
articles.description: Right-wing attorney John Eastman has dropped his challenge to the House's pursuit of his call log data, according to a new federal court filing.

articles.title: Woodward: Jan. 6 committee has written Trump's political obituary - CNN Video
articles.description: Watergate journalist Bob Woodward tells CNN's Wolf Blitzer that he thinks testimony during the January 6 committee's investigation is enough to end former President Donald Trump's political career.

articles.title: Opinion: Cassidy Hutchinson is the witness America has been waiting for

articles.title: 'This is a bombshell': Trump aides left speechless by Hutchinson testimony
articles.description: Aides to former President Donald Trump were left speechless amid the first half of Cassidy Hutchinson's testimony on Tuesday, acknowledging to CNN that her testimony was "a bombshell" with potentially huge repercussions for Trump.

articles.title: Why today's 1/6 hearing was utterly devastating for Donald Trump
articles.description: To date, the January 6 committee has provided a clinical, step by step breakdown of who knew what when in the days leading up to the insurrection at the US Capitol.
